translations: 卷发的人；卷发夹子；冰壶运动员

sentences.sentence: Blow - drying replace the old method of putt curler into wet hair.
sentences.translation: 边吹干边吹发型的方法取代了湿发上卷子的老方法。

sentences.sentence: Remember to mildly heat the curler before you use it for the best results!
sentences.translation: 记得在使用前稍微加热睫毛夹，这样才能达到最佳效果！

sentences.sentence: To make your eyelashes look longer, you need a good mascara and an eyelash curler.
sentences.translation: 憩让眼睫毛看起来长一点，你需要一只好的睫毛膏和一个睫毛夹。
